## What support does team RI provide?

::: {.callout-note}
## We demonstrate research impact by &#8230;
- Collecting data on research unit\ 
  - *for group, department, faculty*
- linking those data to indicators
  - *citations, media attention, impact on policy, SDGs*
- giving insight into impact to improve decision making.
  - *visualisations, interactive dashboards*
:::

## Ongoing developments

::: {.callout-note}
## Open data for metrics
- Open research information as default option
- [Openalex](https://openalex.org/works), [Openaire](https://netherlands.openaire.eu/)
- National and international initiatives
- More transparent assessment, more community involvement, more flexibility
:::

::: {.callout-note}
## Metrics for TTANPRA
- Exploring information on preprints, research data, software
- Relevant for "Rewards and Recognition" program
- Relevant for open science
:::

## More open, less proprietary data

::: {.callout-note}
## Commitment to open research assessment
- Open data sources where possible
- Not fully open yet (if ever)
- Decreasing usage of proprietary sources
:::

::: {.callout-note}
## Web of Science license ending 2025
- Primarily values-based decision
- Finance is never irrelevant
- Known issues:
  - Systematic literature reviews
  - SBE: use of Article Influence Score
- Exploring open workflows 
:::
